gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hornets 111, Kings 104
gameRecap.excerpt: The Hornets closed the game on a 17-4 run in the final 3:42 of the game to complete the comeback, defeating the Kings, 111-104.  Terry Rozier led the way with 34 points and six assists for the Hornets, while Miles Bridges added 27 points, five rebounds and three assists in the victory.  DeAaron Fox tallied 30 points, five rebounds and six assists for the Kings in the losing effort.  The Hornets improve to 8-24 on the season, while the Kings fall to 19-13.
